description: bw start currently prints a minimal 'started <id>' line. Enhance it to show full issue context (summary, description, children, dependency map, comments) plus a 'LANDING THE WORK' section rendered from a new start.md template. This moves per-task conditional workflow hints (PR review, etc.) out of prime.md and into the point-of-action briefing where they're most useful. Prime.md gets slimmed and restructured to focus on the mental model rather than procedure.
title: Enhance bw start with rich context and landing instructions
